hero.f-highlight: Model C is more than a tool -
hero.f-paragraph: it is a way of strengthening social and environmental impact businesses that transform the world while maintaining economic viability. In version 2.0, it has evolved without losing its essence: that of coherently integrating social and environmental impact with commercial and financial logic.
hero.s-highlight: The letter C continues to represent what makes Model C different:
hero.s-paragraph: Complete, Collaborative, Connected to Complexity and Comprehensible. A model for businesses that want to grow with purpose and generate relevant change.
